mapper.select: SELECT KNR.REQ_ID -- .ID , KNR.SHN_SHZ -- . , CDM.VALUE1_KANJ AS REQ_STS_NM -- . , KNR.REQ_JGI_NAME -- . , KNR.REQ_YMDHMS -- . , KNR.SHN_SHA_ID -- . , KNR.SHN_YMDHMS -- . , KNR.APR_SHA_ID -- . , KNR.APR_YMDHMS -- . , KNR.REQ_JGI_NO -- . , KNR.REQ_BR_CODE -- . , KNR.REQ_DIST_CODE -- . , KNR.REQ_STS -- . , KNR.SHN_JGI_NO -- . , KNR.APR_JGI_NO -- . , TO_CHAR(KNR.UPD_SHA_YMD,'YYYYMMDDhh24miss') AS UPD_SHA_YMD -- . , HCO.ULT_INS_NO -- _.DCF , ULT.SHISETSU_NM -- ULT_MDB. , HCO.INS_SBT -- _. , HCO.MAIN_INS_NO -- _. , MSTMAIN.INS_ABBR_NAME AS MAIN_INS_NM -- , HCO.INS_ABBR_NAME -- _. , HCO.INS_KANA -- _. , HCO.INS_FORMAL_NAME -- _. , HCO.INS_CONT_NAME -- _. , HCO.TRADE_TYPE -- _. , HCO.INS_OPEN_YEAR -- _. , HCO.INS_OPEN_MONTH -- _. , HCO.INS_OPEN_DAY -- _. , HCO.INS_PCODE -- _. , HCO.ADDR_CODE_PREF -- _.JIS , ADDR.ADDR_NAME_PREF -- , HCO.ADDR_CODE_CITY -- _.JIS , ADDR.ADDR_NAME_CITY -- , HCO.INS_ADDR_DT -- _. , HCO.TK_CITY_CD -- _. , ADDR.TK_CITY_NAME -- , HCO.INS_PHONE1 -- _.1 , HCO.INS_PHONE2 -- _.2 , HCO.INS_FAX1 -- _.FAX1 , HCO.INS_FAX2 -- _.FAX2 , HCO.INS_URL -- _. , HCO.INS_URL_YMD -- _. , HCO.INS_ADDR_KANA -- _. , HCO.PHARM_TYPE -- _. , HCO.INS_RANK -- _. , HCO.REG_VIS_TYPE -- _. , HCO.IMP_HOS_TYPE -- _. , HCO.UNIV_SUBDIV -- _. , HCO.HO_INS_TYPE -- _. , HCO.MANAGE_CD -- _. , HCO.BEDCNT_BASE -- _.() , HCO.BEDCNT04 -- _.() , HCO.BEDCNT01 -- _.() , HCO.BEDCNT05 -- _.() , HCO.BEDCNT03 -- _.() , HCO.BEDCNT07 -- _.() , HCO.BEDCNT02 -- _.() , HCO.BEDCNT06 -- _.() , HCO.BEDS_TOT -- _. , HCO.MED_BEDS_TOT -- _. , HCO.ENTCAPA_NUM -- _. , HCO.VAC_INS_TYPE -- _.() , HCO.VAC_VISIT_TYPE -- _.() , KNR.REQ_COMMENT -- . , KNR.APR_MEMO -- . , KNR.SHN_FLG -- . FROM T_RDM_REQ_KNR KNR --- INNER JOIN T_RDM_HCO_REQ HCO ---_ ON 1=1 AND HCO.REQ_ID = KNR.REQ_ID LEFT JOIN T_RDM_M_MDB_HCO_MST ULT -- ULT_MDB ON 1=1 AND ULT.DCF_SHISETSU_CD = HCO.ULT_INS_NO LEFT JOIN M_RDM_CODE_MST CDM -- ON 1=1 AND CDM.CODE_NAME = 'REQ_STS' AND CDM.DEL_FLG = '0' AND CDM.VALUE1 = KNR.REQ_STS LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCO_MST MSTMAIN -- _ ON 1=1 AND HCO.MAIN_INS_NO = MSTMAIN.INS_NO LEFT JOIN COM_POS_ADDR ADDR ON 1=1 AND HCO.INS_PCODE = ADDR.POST_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND KNR.REQ_ID = #{inReqId}

SELECT ULT.DCF_SHISETSU_CD -- ULT_MDB.DCF , ULT.SHISETSU_NM -- ULT_MDB. , ULT.SHISETSU_NM_KANA -- ULT_MDB. , ULT.SHISETSU_NM_RYAKU -- ULT_MDB. , ULT.KAIGYO_YM -- ULT_MDB. , ULT.YUBIN_NO -- ULT_MDB. , ULT.TODOFUKEN_CD -- ULT_MDB. , ADDR.ADDR_NAME_PREF AS TODOFUKEN_NM -- , ULT.SHIKUCHOSON_CD -- ULT_MDB. , ADDR.ADDR_NAME_CITY AS SHIKUCHOSON_NM -- , ULT.ADDRESS -- ULT_MDB. , ULT.ADDRESS_KANA -- ULT_MDB. , ADDR.TK_CITY_CD -- , ADDR.TK_CITY_NAME -- , ULT.SHISETSU_TEL -- ULT_MDB. , KEI.SET_DT_CD -- . , ULT.KYOKABYOSHOSU_SUM -- ULT_MDB. , ULT.KYOKABYOSHOSU_KEKKAKU -- ULT_MDB. , ULT.KYOKABYOSHOSU_IPPAN -- ULT_MDB. , ULT.KYOKABYOSHOSU_KANSEN -- ULT_MDB. , ULT.KYOKABYOSHOSU_SEISHIN -- ULT_MDB. , ULT.KYOKABYOSHOSU_RYOYO -- ULT_MDB. FROM T_RDM_M_MDB_HCO_MST ULT -- ULT_MDB LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCO_KEIEITAI_LNK_MST KEI -- ON 1=1 AND KEI.KEIEITAI_CD = ULT.KEIEITAI_CD LEFT JOIN COM_POS_ADDR ADDR ON 1=1 AND ULT.YUBIN_NO = ADDR.POST_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND ULT.DCF_SHISETSU_CD = #{inUltInsNo}

SELECT HCO.REQ_ID -- _.ID FROM T_RDM_HCO_REQ HCO ---_ INNER JOIN T_RDM_REQ_KNR KNR --- ON 1=1 AND HCO.REQ_ID = KNR.REQ_ID AND KNR.REQ_TYPE IN ('01') AND KNR.REQ_STS IN ('03','13','04','14') AND KNR.REQ_ID <> #{reqId} WHERE 1=1 AND HCO.ULT_INS_NO = #{ultInsNo}

SELECT HCO.REQ_ID -- _.ID FROM T_RDM_HCO_REQ HCO ---_ INNER JOIN T_RDM_REQ_KNR KNR --- ON 1=1 AND HCO.REQ_ID = KNR.REQ_ID AND KNR.REQ_TYPE IN ('03') AND KNR.REQ_STS IN ('03','13','04','14') WHERE 1=1 AND HCO.INS_NO = #{insNo}
